values: 害羞的；羞怯的；腼腆的；胆怯的；胆小的；怕生的；易受惊的；怕人的；欠缺的；缺乏的；不足的；短缺的；迟疑的；犹豫的；顾虑的；畏缩的；不情愿的
回避；躲避；避开；畏缩；退缩；惊跳；惊退；惊逸；被惊走
畏缩；回避；惊跳；惊逸；（马）惊退；躲闪

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 害羞地；羞怯地；胆怯地；小心地

word_group.brief_definition: 一次吃亏；下次小心；一次被咬；下次胆小
非常害羞；很害羞；十分害羞

bilingual.target: 哦，你是一个害羞的医生！

bilingual.source: I used to be a really shy person.
bilingual.target: 我过去是一个非常害羞的人。

bilingual.source: The shy animals are attracted by the smell and coming around the cameras.
bilingual.target: 害羞的动物被气味吸引，来到相机周围。

bilingual.source: The shy child hid behind his mother.
bilingual.target: 那个害羞的孩子躲在他妈妈后面。

bilingual.source: The suni is known for its shy nature.
bilingual.target: 岛羚以其害羞的天性而闻名。

bilingual.source: The shy girl was blushing during her speech.
bilingual.target: 那个害羞的女孩在演讲时脸红了。

bilingual.source: She gave a shy smile when he complimented her.
bilingual.target: 当他夸奖她时，她露出了害羞的微笑。

bilingual.source: It's a misconception that all introverts are shy.
bilingual.target: 所有内向的人都害羞的这种误解。

bilingual.source: His shy nature made him inhibited in social situations.
bilingual.target: 他害羞的性格使他在社交场合中显得很拘谨。

bilingual.source: The teacher coaxed the shy student to participate in the class discussion.
bilingual.target: 老师哄劝害羞的学生参加课堂讨论。

list.abstract: shy，英文单词，形容词、名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作形容词时意为“害羞的；畏缩的，胆怯的”，作名词时意为“投掷；惊跳，人名；(英)夏伊”，作及物动词时意为“投；乱掷”，作不及物动词时意为“投；畏缩；惊退；厌恶”。

Shy（害羞）是一支英格兰Hard rock乐队，成立时取名Trojan。Shy成员包括主唱Tony Mills、吉他Steve Harris、键盘Paddy McKenna 、贝司Mark Badrick、鼓手Alan Kelly。1987年，发行专辑《Excess All AreasShy》，在美国和欧洲进行巡演。Shy的首张《Brave the Storm》，被称为世界级唱片，取得成功。1994年，Mills被XS/AFTER HOURS的前主唱Jon Francis代替。2002年，乐队发行Mills作主唱，并以Man的鼓手Bob Richards替换掉Kelly。2005年，Shy通过MTM厂牌发行《Sunset And Vine》专辑。2009年1月，Lee Small离开Shy。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright. Don't be shy. Any suggestion will do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家别害羞，各种建议都可以。

yingyinNormal.en: Where are you going? just put them on. Here? Oh, are you shy? No, I'm not shy. Don't worry. I won't look.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你去哪里？就这样换了。在这？你还害羞啊？没，我没害羞。别担心，我不会看的。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, be a little shy, don't make too much eye contact.
yingyinNormal.zh: 羞涩一点，少点眼神交流。

yingyinNormal.en: My goodness. That was loud. Do it again. Emily is not shy anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢我的天啊！这才是最响的。再来一次吧。艾米丽现在没有那么害羞了。

yingyinNormal.en: George, say something to Polly. George is a little bit shy. Hello. Hello.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治，你和波莉说说话。乔治有点不好意思。你好啊。你好啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, it was clear he had feelings for me, but he was just too shy to show them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道他对我动心了，只是怯于表达爱意。

yingyinNormal.en: Emily is a bit shy. Who would like to show Emily where to hang her coat? Me. Me. Me. Me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾米丽有点害羞。谁能告诉艾米丽衣服应该挂在哪里？我！我！我！我！

yingyinNormal.en: He was so shy and so cute and his hair, it smelled like watermelon. I couldn't get enough of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他如此腼腆可人，他的发丝间弥漫着西瓜的香氛，我简直如痴如醉。

yingyinNormal.en: I think you'll find if I come to work here that I don't micro-manage. I don't shy away from delegating.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会发现我不会事必躬亲，我不害怕沟通。

yingyinNormal.en: Just in time! Pedro the Hunter! Pedro is a bit shy. Pedro, would you like me to come on with you? Yes, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常的及时。猎人佩德罗来啦。佩德罗有点害羞。佩德罗，需要我跟在你后面吗？是的，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you're a real catch. I know you're shy, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't have someone wonderful in your life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对啊，你真的是个好对象，我知道你害羞，但这并不意味着你生命中不应拥有一位佳人。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to put some pressure on you to acknowledge the hard truths not shy away from them and when you see them to address them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让你们认识到，真相虽然有时难以接受，但很重要。不要逃避，碰到时就要勇于面对。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, it's a hedgehog. They like to eat slugs and snails. Hello, hedgehog. Oh, he's rolled into a ball. Yes, Peppa. He's very shy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个是刺猬，他们喜欢吃鼻涕虫和蜗牛。你好，刺猬。哦，他蜷成一个球了！是的，佩奇，他非常害羞。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not sure I have any questions for you.Oh, don't be shy, Will. I mean, after all, this is a rare opportunity. Just between you and me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不确定我想问你问题。别害羞，威尔。毕竟，机会难得。只有你和我。

yingyinNormal.en: But, wow, this is hard. I'm kind of shy. Seriously, Gunther, you should see someone about that cold. If it gets much worse, you could die.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是真是很难开口，我有点害羞。真的，你应该去看医生的，如果感冒越来越严重，你可是会死的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm the Hunter and… Pedro is a bit shy. Neigh, you say, "I'm going to chase you away, you Big Bad Wolf!" Go away, naughty wolf. Very good, Pedro.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是个猎人还有...佩德罗有点害羞。你要说，我要把你赶跑，你这坏蛋大灰狼！快走开，你这只顽皮的狼。非常好，佩德罗。

yingyinNormal.en: Because she's shy! Bingley too, is modest and was persuaded she didn't feel strongly for him. Because you suggested it. I did it for his own good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是因为她害羞！彬格莱被说服了，她的感觉并不强列。是你说的。我这样做是为了他好。

yingyinNormal.en: I read poetry to her the first time we talked. Not any of mine. I was too shy for that. One of my favorite poets, and she used to love it when I read to her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一次聊天时，我为她读了诗。不是我写的，我太害羞了。是我最喜欢的诗人之一，她那时非常喜欢我读诗给她听。

yingyinNormal.en: The year I turned 26, as the head of my own brokerage firm, I made 49 million dollars, which really pissed me off, because it was three shy of a million a week.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我26岁那年依靠自己的股票经纪公司赚了4千9百万，这让我超级不爽的，就差那么3百万就可以一周赚1百万了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: When we <highlight>shy</highlight> away from casual interactions with strangers, it is often due to a misplaced anxiet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们回避与陌生人的随意互动时，往往是因为一种错位的焦虑，觉得他们可能不想和我们说话。

sense_info_list.en: start suddenly aside through fright or alarm

examination_example.sentence: Those who don't <highlight>shy</highlight> away from opening up but freely share who they are and what they care about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些不避讳开放，而是自由分享自己是谁，关心什么的人。

examination_example.sentence: I had done my homework but I was <highlight>shy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我做了作业，但我很害羞。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 羞怯地；胆怯地；小心地

word_family.mean: adj. 害羞的；腼腆的；不足；缺少；开花不多的；结果很少的；迟疑的；顾虑的；不喜欢的；厌恶的

examination_example.sentence: He used to be so <highlight>shy</highlight> and quiet.
Children with no brothers and sisters may be <highlight>shy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有兄弟姐妹的孩子可能会害羞。

examination_example.sentence: It is found that family size might cause people to be <highlight>shy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究发现，家庭规模可能会导致人们害羞。

examination_example.sentence: He said, “Oh, just <highlight>shy</highlight> of $3 million. I nearly fell out of my chair.”
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说：“哦，差300万美元。我差点从椅子上摔下来。”
